title: Sales Policy
description: {"time":1581673667562,"blocks":[{"type":"header","data":{"text":"SALES & REPLACEMENT TERMS AND CONDITIONS (“TERMS”)","level":2}},{"type":"header","data":{"text":"Cambodia Sales and Replacement Policy","level":3}},{"type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Thank you for your purchase! At KOOMPI, we ideally want our products to be smooth, effective, and enjoyable. For secure customer experience, KOOMPI provides a certain warranty to all KOOMPI products that you purchase. (We’ll refer to these entities as the “KOOMPI” in this policy.)"}},{"type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Below are the terms and conditions that apply to transactions at KOOMPI. By placing an order or making a purchase at KOOMPI, you agree to the terms set forth below."}},{"type":"header","data":{"text":"Standard Return Policy","level":3}},{"type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"We understand that some products might not be perfect and we are happy to correct that. Our hardware team is ready to assist you in cases where certain materials aren’t working as they should. In these cases, we would like you to review the terms below to see whether the product is replaceable or repairable. "}},{"type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"For any undamaged KOOMPI laptop, please return it with its charger and (clean) packaging along with the original receipt within 14 days of the date you receive the product, and we’ll give you a replacement product free-of-charge. In addition, please note the following:"}},{"type":"list","data":{"style":"ordered","items":["Products can be returned only in the country or region in Cambodia","KOOMPI does not give refunds. However, we are happy to give you a product replacement if you encounter extreme difficulty in using the product. Contact our community support through this link for more details. ","Our software team is ready to support any difficulty/errors users encounter with KOOMPI OS. Another OS (used on KOOMPI laptops) is not guaranteed technical support from the KOOMPI team. ","Products that are not eligible for returned/replaced or repair are:"]}},{"type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"             1. products that are damaged from being dropped or mishandled (resulting in dents, scratches, shattered screens/camera, damaged keyboards) by consumer "}},{"type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"             2. products that have been submerged or exposed to liquid or moisture"}},{"type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"             3. products subjected to negligence (build-up of dirt, debris)"}},{"type":"header","data":{"text":"In-Store Pickup ","level":3}},{"type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"KOOMPI offers in-store pickup for all of our products. An issued receipt from the KOOMPI team will be required for pickup of repaired products. "}},{"type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"For pre-orders, KOOMPI will notify you when your order is ready and the date by which you need to pick up your items. "}},{"type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"We’ll notify you for both cases through a phone call. "}},{"type":"header","data":{"text":"Pricing and Price Reductions/Corrections","level":3}},{"type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"KOOMPI reserves the right to change prices for products displayed at/on the KOOMPI website at any time and to correct pricing errors that may occur. Prices are shown on the website and KOOMPI’s social media platforms are in U.S. dollars. If you are paying with Khmer Riels, please note that the purchase price may fluctuate with exchange rates. We accept payment in cash. "}},{"type":"header","data":{"text":"Retail Partners ","level":3}},{"type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"KOOMPI sells and ships products to retailers, and reserves the right to set a maximum price for KOOMPI products. We are not responsible for the varying price of KOOMPI products across retail partners’ stores. However, we try our best to give our partners fair retail pricing to prevent any overcharge for end-consumers.   "}},{"type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"KOOMPI can be bought at various computer stores in Phnom Penh. You may explore all stores through this link. "}},{"type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"You can also directly buy KOOMPI at our office (Pteas Boran). "}},{"type":"header","data":{"text":"Cambodia Shipping Only","level":4}},{"type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Products purchased will only be shipped to addresses within Cambodia."}},{"type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"KOOMPI delivers and sets up KOOMPI products for free for orders up to ten KOOMPI laptops."}},{"type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"KOOMPI does not ship overseas or make overseas transactions at the moment. "}}],"version":"2.16.1"}

title: Privacy Policy
description: {"time":1584593046457,"blocks":[{"type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Effective date: June 19, 2019"}},{"type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"We will gather the data you provide to improve the Service. By using the Service, you agree to the term and condition use of information in accordance with this policy. Unless otherwise defined in this Privacy Policy, will have the same meanings as in our Terms and Conditions, accessible from https://koompi.com"}},{"type":"header","data":{"text":"Information Collection And Use","level":2}},{"type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"We collect several different types of information for various purposes to provide and improve our Service to you."}},{"type":"header","data":{"text":"Types of Data Collected","level":2}},{"type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Personal Data"}},{"type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"While using our Service, we may ask you to provide us with certain personal information that can be used to contact or identify your Personal Data. Personally, your personal information may include, but is not limited to:"}},{"type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"\tEmail address"}},{"type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"\tFirst name and last name            "}},{"type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Cookies and Usage Data"}},{"type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Usage Data"}},{"type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"We may also collect the information on how the Service is accessed and used. This Usage Data may include information such as your computer's Internet Protocol address, browser type, browser version, the pages of our Service that you visit, the time and date of your visit, the time spent on those pages, unique device identifiers and other diagnostic data."}},{"type":"header","data":{"text":"Tracking Cookies Data","level":2}},{"type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to track down the activity on our Service and hold certain information."}},{"type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Tracking technologies also used beacons, tags, and scripts to collect and track information to improve and analyze our Service."}},{"type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"You can instruct your browser to refuse all cookies or to indicate when a cookie is being sent. However, if you do not accept cookies, you may not be able to use some portions of our Service."}},{"type":"header","data":{"text":"Use of Data","level":2}},{"type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"KOOMPI uses the collected data for various purposes:            "}},{"type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"To provide and maintain the Service"}},{"type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"\tTo notify you about changes of our Service"}},{"type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"\tTo allow you to participate in interactive features of our Service when you choose to do so"}},{"type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"\tTo provide customer care and support"}},{"type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"\tTo provide analysis or valuable information so that we can improve the Service"}},{"type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"\tTo monitor the usage of the Service"}},{"type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"\tTo detect, prevent and address technical issues"}},{"type":"header","data":{"text":"Transfer Of Data","level":2}},{"type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Your information, including Personal Data, may be transferred to — and maintained on — computers located outside of your state, province, country or other governmental jurisdiction where the data protection laws may differ than those from your jurisdiction."}},{"type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"If you are located outside Cambodia and choose to provide information to us, please note that we transfer the data, including Personal Data, to Cambodia and process it there."}},{"type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Your consent to this Privacy Policy followed by your submission of such information represents your agreement to that transfer."}},{"type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"KOOMPI will take all steps reasonably necessary to ensure that your data is treated securely and in accordance with this Privacy Policy and no transfer of your Personal Data will take place to an organization or a country unless there are adequate controls in place including the security of your data and other personal information."}},{"type":"header","data":{"text":"Disclosure Of Data","level":2}},{"type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Legal Requirements"}},{"type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"KOOMPI may disclose your Personal Data in the good faith belief that such action is necessary to:            0"}},{"type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"To comply with a legal obligation"}},{"type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"\tTo protect and defend the rights or property of KOOMPI"}},{"type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"\tTo prevent or investigate possible wrongdoing in connection with the Service"}},{"type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"\tTo protect the personal safety of users of the Service or the public"}},{"type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"\tTo protect against legal liability"}},{"type":"header","data":{"text":"Security Of Data","level":2}},{"type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"The security of your data is important to us, but remember that no method of transmission over the Internet, or method of electronic storage is 100% secure, we cannot guarantee its absolute security."}},{"type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Service Providers"}},{"type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"We may employ third party companies and individuals to facilitate our Service, to provide the Service on our behalf, to perform Service-related services or to assist us in analyzing how our Service is used."}},{"type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"These third parties have access to your Personal Data only to perform these tasks on our behalf and are obligated not to disclose or use it for any other purposes"}},{"type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Links to Other Sites"}},{"type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Our Service may contain links to other sites that are not operated by us. If you click on a third party link, you will be directed to that third party's site. We strongly advise you to review the Privacy Policy of every site you visit."}},{"type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"We have no control over and assume no responsibility for the content, privacy policies or practices of any third party sites or services."}},{"type":"header","data":{"text":"Changes To This Privacy Policy","level":2}},{"type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page."}},{"type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"We will let you know via email and/or a prominent notice on our Service, prior to the change becoming effective and update the "effective and date" at the top of this Privacy Policy."}},{"type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"You are advised to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes. Changes to this Privacy Policy are effective when they are posted on this page."}},{"type":"header","data":{"text":"Contact Us","level":2}},{"type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us:"}},{"type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"\tBy email: "}},{"type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"\tBy visiting this page on our website: https://koompi.com/contact"}}],"version":"2.16.1"}

title: Terms and Conditions
description: {"time":1584595874444,"blocks":[{"type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Last updated: March 19, 2020"}},{"type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Please read these terms and conditions carefully before using Our Service."}},{"type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Interpretation and Definitions"}},{"type":"header","data":{"text":"Interpretation","level":2}},{"type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"The words of which the initial letter is capitalized have meanings defined under the following conditions."}},{"type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"The following definitions shall have the same meaning regardless of whether they appear in singular or in plural."}},{"type":"header","data":{"text":"Definitions","level":2}},{"type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"For the purposes of these Terms and Conditions:"}},{"type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"·         Affiliate means an entity that controls, is controlled by or is under common control with a party, where \"control\" means ownership of 50% or more of the shares, equity interest or other securities entitled to vote for election of directors or other managing authority."}},{"type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"·         Company (referred to as either \"the Company\", \"We\", \"Us\" or \"Our\" in this Agreement) refers to KOOMPI Co., Ltd. , Phnom Penh ."}},{"type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"·         Country refers to: Cambodia"}},{"type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"·         Service refers to the Website."}},{"type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"·         Terms and Conditions (also referred as \"Terms\") mean these Terms and Conditions that form the entire agreement between You and the Company regarding the use of the Service. This Terms and Conditions agreement as been created with the help of Terms and Conditions Generator."}},{"type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"·         Third-party Social Media Service means any services or content (including data, information, products or services) provided by a third-party that may be displayed, included or made available by the Service."}},{"type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"·         Website refers to KOOMPI, accessible from koompi.com"}},{"type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"·         You means the individual accessing or using the Service, or the company, or other legal entity on behalf of which such individual is accessing or using the Service, as applicable."}},{"type":"header","data":{"text":"Acknowledgement","level":2}},{"type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"These are the Terms and Conditions governing the use of this Service and the agreement that operates between You and the Company. These Terms and Conditions set out the rights and obligations of all users regarding the use of the Service."}},{"type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Your access to and use of the Service is conditioned on Your acceptance of and compliance with these Terms and Conditions. These Terms and Conditions apply to all visitors, users and others who access or use the Service."}},{"type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"By accessing or using the Service You agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions. If You disagree with any part of these Terms and Conditions then You may not access the Service."}},{"type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Your access to and use of the Service is also conditioned on Your acceptance of and compliance with the Privacy Policy of the Company. Our Privacy Policy describes Our policies and procedures on the collection, use and disclosure of Your personal information when You use the Application or the Website and tells You about Your privacy rights and how the law protects You. Please read Our Privacy Policy carefully before using Our Service."}},{"type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Links to Other Websites"}},{"type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Our Service may contain links to third-party web sites or services that are not owned or controlled by the Company."}},{"type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"The Company has no control over, and assumes no responsibility for, the content, privacy policies, or practices of any third party web sites or services. You further acknowledge and agree that the Company shall not be responsible or liable, directly or indirectly, for any damage or loss caused or alleged to be caused by or in connection with the use of or reliance on any such content, goods or services available on or through any such web sites or services."}},{"type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"We strongly advise You to read the terms and conditions and privacy policies of any third-party web sites or services that You visit."}},{"type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Termination"}},{"type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"We may terminate or suspend Your access immediately, without prior notice or liability, for any reason whatsoever, including without limitation if You breach these Terms and Conditions."}},{"type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Upon termination, Your right to use the Service will cease immediately."}},{"type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Limitation of Liability"}},{"type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Notwithstanding any damages that You might incur, the entire liability of the Company and any of its suppliers under any provision of this Terms and Your exclusive remedy for all of the foregoing shall be limited to the amount actually paid by You through the Service or 100 USD if You haven't purchased anything through the Service."}},{"type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"To the maximum extent permitted by applicable law, in no event shall the Company or its suppliers be liable for any special, incidental, indirect, or consequential damages whatsoever (including, but not limited to, damages for loss of profits, loss of data or other information, for business interruption, for personal injury, loss of privacy arising out of or in any way related to the use of or inability to use the Service, third-party software and/or third-party hardware used with the Service, or otherwise in connection with any provision of this Terms), even if the Company or any supplier has been advised of the possibility of such damages and even if the remedy fails of its essential purpose."}},{"type":"header","data":{"text":"\"AS IS\" and \"AS AVAILABLE\" Disclaimer","level":2}},{"type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"The Service is provided to You \"AS IS\" and \"AS AVAILABLE\" and with all faults and defects without warranty of any kind. To the maximum extent permitted under applicable law, the Company, on its own behalf and on behalf of its Affiliates and its and their respective licensors and service providers, expressly disclaims all warranties, whether express, implied, statutory or otherwise, with respect to the Service, including all implied warranties of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, title and non-infringement, and warranties that may arise out of course of dealing, course of performance, usage or trade practice. Without limitation to the foregoing, the Company provides no warranty or undertaking, and makes no representation of any kind that the Service will meet Your requirements, achieve any intended results, be compatible or work with any other software, applications, systems or services, operate without interruption, meet any performance or reliability standards or be error free or that any errors or defects can or will be corrected."}},{"type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Without limiting the foregoing, neither the Company nor any of the company's provider makes any representation or warranty of any kind, express or implied: (i) as to the operation or availability of the Service, or the information, content, and materials or products included thereon; (ii) that the Service will be uninterrupted or error-free; (iii) as to the accuracy, reliability, or currency of any information or content provided through the Service; or (iv) that the Service, its servers, the content, or e-mails sent from or on behalf of the Company are free of viruses, scripts, trojan horses, worms, malware, timebombs or other harmful components."}},{"type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Some jurisdictions do not allow the exclusion of certain types of warranties or limitations on applicable statutory rights of a consumer, so some or all of the above exclusions and limitations may not apply to You. But in such a case the exclusions and limitations set forth in this section shall be applied to the greatest extent enforceable under applicable law."}},{"type":"header","data":{"text":"Governing Law","level":2}},{"type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"The laws of the Country, excluding its conflicts of law rules, shall govern this Terms and Your use of the Service. Your use of the Application may also be subject to other local, state, national, or international laws."}},{"type":"header","data":{"text":"Disputes Resolution","level":2}},{"type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"If You have any concern or dispute about the Service, You agree to first try to resolve the dispute informally by contacting the Company."}},{"type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"For European Union (EU) Users"}},{"type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"If You are a European Union consumer, you will benefit from any mandatory provisions of the law of the country in which you are resident in."}},{"type":"header","data":{"text":"Severability and Waiver","level":2}},{"type":"header","data":{"text":"Severability","level":2}},{"type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"If any provision of these Terms is held to be unenforceable or invalid, such provision will be changed and interpreted to accomplish the objectives of such provision to the greatest extent possible under applicable law and the remaining provisions will continue in full force and effect."}},{"type":"header","data":{"text":"Waiver","level":2}},{"type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Except as provided herein, the failure to exercise a right or to require performance of an obligation under this Terms shall not effect a party's ability to exercise such right or require such performance at any time thereafter nor shall be the waiver of a breach constitute a waiver of any subsequent breach."}},{"type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Translation Interpretation"}},{"type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"These Terms and Conditions may have been translated if We have made them available to You on our Service."}},{"type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"You agree that the original English text shall prevail in the case of a dispute."}},{"type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Changes to These Terms and Conditions"}},{"type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"We reserve the right, at Our sole discretion, to modify or replace these Terms at any time. If a revision is material We will make reasonable efforts to provide at least 30 days' notice prior to any new terms taking effect. What constitutes a material change will be determined at Our sole discretion."}},{"type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"By continuing to access or use Our Service after those revisions become effective, You agree to be bound by the revised terms. If You do not agree to the new terms, in whole or in part, please stop using the website and the Service."}},{"type":"header","data":{"text":"Contact Us","level":2}},{"type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"If you have any questions about these Terms and Conditions, You can contact us:"}},{"type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"·         By visiting this page on our website: koompi.com/contact"}},{"type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"·         By phone number: +855 77 990 887"}}],"version":"2.16.1"}
